titleStmt.title: Fear God, honour the King: or, Great Brittains allegeance to their royall Soveraign in a loyal remonstrance to Cherles the II. for the establishing of him in his royal thorne, and the restoring of him to crown and scepter.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Obediah Brook, and are to be sold near the Castle in Cornhil,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
